#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
#include <fstream>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <queue>
#include <math.h>
#include <cmath>
#include <queue>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	map<char, int> H;
	H['A'] = 1;
	H['B'] = 2;
	H['C'] = 0;
	H['D'] = 1;
	H['E'] = 0;
	H['F'] = 0;
	H['G'] = 0;
	H['H'] = 0;
	H['I'] = 0;
	H['J'] = 0;
	H['K'] = 0;
	H['L'] = 0;
	H['M'] = 0;
	H['N'] = 0;
	H['O'] = 1;
	H['P'] = 1;
	H['Q'] = 1;
	H['R'] = 1;
	H['S'] = 0;
	H['T'] = 0;
	H['U'] = 0;
	H['V'] = 0;
	H['W'] = 0;
	H['X'] = 0;
	H['Y'] = 0;
	H['Z'] = 0;
	int T;
	cin >> T;
	string s;
	for (int t = 0; t < T; t++) {
		cin >> s;
		int ans = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) {
			ans += H[s[i]];
		}
		cout << ans << endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
